description: SVG overlay configuration for VKB Gladiator EVO Right stick template

_comments.stroke: Set to a color like 'white' or '#FFFFFF' to add an outline around text
_comments.stroke_width: Width of the stroke in pixels (e.g., 2)
_comments.text_wrap.enabled: Set to true to wrap text across multiple lines
_comments.text_wrap.max_words_per_line: Maximum number of words per line (e.g., 2)
_comments.text_wrap.line_spacing: Multiplier for line height (e.g., 1.2 = 120% of font size)
_comments.background.enabled: Set to true to add a background rectangle behind text
